name: Gauntlet through the wilderness
description:
This is a simple RTS game where you have to defend your caravan against enemies while you travel through the wilderness.

Known issues
Never had time to balance the game, so right now it's insanely difficult.
Right at the start, the camera starts 200 units to the north (up) of where it should start about 50% of the time. Never managed to track this down.
- Healthbars stopped following camera.
- Setting and back button broke in last build. Settings should be removed since volume is on main page now.
- Caravan movement is weird.

Credits

GIldar
Messy project Architecture :)
Programming
Menu and cover art
Scene generation
Asset integration

Programming
